decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL1/PP/2164/JR/04 and PL1/PP/2164/JR/02, dated 04 2014, received 04/07/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a part first floor rear extension, a pitched roof to the single storey rear extension and pitched roof to the two storey side extension to the house
